## index

```{python}
import pandas as pd
df = pd.read_csv("data/vocab.csv", dtype=str).fillna("")
df["letter"] = df["es"].str.normalize("NFKD").str.lower().str.replace(r"[^a-zñáéíóúü]", "", regex=True).str[0].fillna("#")

out = []
for letter in sorted(df["letter"].unique()):
    block = df[df["letter"]==letter].sort_values("es")[["es","pos","meaning_de","meaning_en","example_es"]]
    out.append(f"### {letter.upper()}\n\n" + block.to_markdown(index=False) + "\n")
print("\n".join(out))
```
